title: SET_VEHICLE_HAS_UNBREAKABLE_LIGHTS
content:
0x1AA8A837D2169D940x009AB49E// SetVehicleHasUnbreakableLights
void SET_VEHICLE_HAS_UNBREAKABLE_LIGHTS(Vehicle vehicle, BOOL toggle);Parameters:vehicle: The target vehicle.toggle: Set the lights' breakability true makes lights unbreakable, false allows them to break.Sets whether the vehicle's lights can be broken.NativeDB Introduced: v323Old name:  _SET_VEHICLE_LIGHTS_CAN_BE_VISIBLY_DAMAGEDExamples:LuaJavaScriptC#local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
if not vehicle then return end

-- Make the vehicle's lights unbreakable
SetVehicleHasUnbreakableLights(vehicle, true)
codeBlocks:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
if not vehicle then return end

-- Make the vehicle's lights unbreakable
SetVehicleHasUnbreakableLights(vehicle, true)
